description: The fresh fig leaf flavor was introduced into this cocktail using a simple syrup of sugar, water, and fresh fig leaves. Tito's Vodka was the spirit of choice for this gimlet and is a favorite of ours since it's reasonably priced and has a refined flavor that compliments artisanal cocktails. However, feel free to use any&nbsp;vodka you want.
name: Fig Vodka Gimlet
recipeIngredient: 3 to 4 pcs of Fresh fig leafs
Fig slice or lime peel for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Over medium-high heat, mix the water, sugar, and fig leaves in a medium saucepan. Boil for 2 to 3 minutes while stirring to dissolve the sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Take it off the heat and let it sit to cool and steep for about an hour.
